# GCInputLeftTrigger

**Global Variable**

The name of the left trigger.

## Declaration

```swift
var GCInputLeftTrigger: String { get }
```

## Related Documentation

- **leftTrigger**: The controller’s left trigger element.

## Trigger names

- **GCInputRightTrigger**: The name of the right trigger.
